title: Sweet Home (video game)
description: Capcom devoloped game that was looked to for inspiration when making the first Resident Evil

title: Sweet Home (movie)
description: The movie that the game Sweet Home, Resident Evil's eventual inspiration, was based on.

title: Resident Evil
availability: PS1, PS3, PS4, PS5, PSVita, Saturn, NDS, PC
description: The very first product of the IP. Features Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine of STARS Alpha team trying to escape the Spencer Mansion filled with Bio-organic weapons created through the t-Virus.

title: Resident Evil (Marvel)
description: Prequel comic to the first Resident Evil covering Alpha team preparing to look for Bravo team just before the start of the game.

title: BIO HAZARD ~The Tragedy of Makoba Village~ SOUND DRAMA
description: An audio drama set before the events of the first Resident Evil starring Jill Valentine investigating a village in the Arklay Mountains.

title: George Trevor's Notes
event: George Trevor's visit to the Spencer Mansion
description: Prequel novella to the first Resident Evil about the architech who built the Spencer Mansion. Printed in the supplement book "The True Story Behind BIO HAZARD".

title: Resident Evil: The Book
description: Prequel novella to the first Resident Evil. Focuses on exploring Chris' backstory and character. Originally printed in the supplement book "The True Story Behind BIO HAZARD as "BIO HAZARD: The Beginning".

title: BIO HAZARD DRAMA ALBUM ~The Doomed Raccoon City~ series
description: A series of three drama albums that tell individual stories of civilians during the outbreak in Raccoon City, taking place over four nights.

title: BIOHAZARD 2 TV-CM
availability: No official availability. Viewable on YouTube
description: Live-action commercial for Resident Evil 2 directed by George A. Romero, aired only in Japan.

title: Resident Evil 2
availability: PS1, PS3, N64, GC, DC, GameCom, 99x
description: Sequel to the first Resident Evil. Stars Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield escaping from Raccoon City while the monster "G" continues to mutate from the even more deadly G-virus.

title: BIO HAZARD The Wicked North Sea
description: An original novel by Kyu Asakura exploring one of Umbrella's founding families.

title: BIO HAZARD 2 (manhua)
event: Raccoon City Incident, Different Space, God's ambition
description: Manhua adaptiation of Resident Evil 2. Notably goes far away from the source material and involves ki, visiting another dimension, and fighting a dragon, culminating in a battle against a villain named "God".

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: An anthology of stories taking place before, during and after Resident Evil, Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3: Nemesis.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: Albert Wesker's debriefing and subsequent report set before the events of the first Resident Evil.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: John's final moments after the outbreak in the Arklay laboratories.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: The surviving members of STARS discussing their ordeals after the Mansion Incident.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: Barry Burton gets entangled in yet another outbreak while seeking therapy after the events of the Mansion Incident.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: A story set before the events of the games.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: A couple on vacation finds themselves in the middle of a G-virus outbreak on Isla Bonale, located in the Caribbean.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
scenario: Dead Air, Zombies Abroad, Kane & Abe
description: Chris Redfield, Jill Valentine, and Barry Burton are dispatched by a "top-secret international agency" to search for Umbrella laboratories in Europe.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Conspiracy
description: Novelization of the first Resident Evil by S.D. Perry. The story deviates slightly from source material and introduces a mysterious character named Trent working behind the scenes against Umbrella.

title: Resident Evil: Caliban Cove
description: An original novel sequel to Resident Evil: The Umbrella Conspiracy. Rebecca Chambers joins a new STARS strike force when rumor comes of another Umbrella experiment hidden beneath the rocky cliffs of Caliban Cove, Maine.

title: Resident Evil 2 (Game.Com)
description: A remake of Resident Evil 2 for a very underpowered console.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: One of Leon Kennedy's first missions as a government agent after the events of Resident Evil 2.

title: Resident Evil 2 (Tiger 99x)
description: A remake of Resident Evil 2 for a very very underpowered handheld console.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
description: The story of a young college student named Dexter Whitlam who stumbles upon an Umbrella secret.

title: BIOHAZARD 2 DRAMA ALBUM ~The Little Runaway Sherry~
description: Audio drama that continues Sherry's story and is set shortly after the end of Resident Evil 2.

title: BIOHAZARD 2 DRAMA ALBUM ~The Female Spy Ada Lives~
description: Audio drama set a few days after the events of Resident Evil 2 starring Ada Wong.

title: Resident Evil: City of the Dead
description: Novelization of Resident Evil 2 by S.D. Perry.

title: Resident Evil: Underworld
description: An original novel sequel to Resident Evil: City of the Dead. Leon Kennedy, Claire Redfield, and the survivors of the Caliban Cove are sent to Utah by the mysterious Trent to investigate yet another Umbrella laboratory.

title: Resident Evil 3: Nemesis
availability: PS1, PS3, PSVita, GC, DC, PC
description: The third major game in the series featuring the return of Jill Valentine from Resident Evil and her escape from Raccoon City while pursued by the Nemesis T-Type.

title: BIOHAZARD 3 LAST ESCAPE (manhua)
description: Manhua adaptation of Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. Significantly deviates from the source material.

title: BIOHAZARD 3 Supplemental Edition
description: An original manhua story set after BIOHAZARD 3 LAST ESCAPE.

title: Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine
scenario: Raccoon City R.I.P., Emmy's Bloody Spoon, Mutant Menagerie, A New Chapter of Evil, Special Delivery
description: Stories set around the Raccoon City Incident.

title: Resident Evil Survivor
description: The first game in the Gun Survivor subseries, games featuring compatibility with the Gun Con peripheral. Stars the investigator Ark Thompson, Leon Kennedy's old friend.

title: Resident Evil CODE:Veronica
availability: DC, PS2, PS3, PS4, GC, X360
description: The first major title after Resident Evil 3: Nemesis featuring Claire and Chris Redfield as they cross paths with Albert Wesker pursuing a sample of the t-Veronica virus. Later revised for the Dreamcast and PlayStation 2 as BIOHAZARD CODE:Veronica Kanzenban and Resident Evil CODE:Veronica X, respectively.

title: Bioroid: Year Zero
description: Musical comedy taking place in a quarantined underground facility named BioCity.

title: Resident Evil: Nemesis
description: Novelization of Resident Evil 3: Nemesis by S.D. Perry. Set concurrently with Resident Evil: City of the Dead.

title: BIOHAZARD 4D-EXECUTER
availability: No official availability. Viewable on YouTube
description: Attraction consisting of a 3D animated feature with "4D" rocking and rumbling seats. Follows a UBCS squad on a top secret mission.

title: Resident Evil: Fire & Ice
description: A continuation of Resident Evil: The Official Comic Magazine. Tells the story of an original STARS team, the Charlie team, created after the destruction of Raccoon City.

title: BIOHAZARD i SURVIVOR
description: Co-operative mobile game featuring new STARS members.

title: Zombie Shooting Gallery
description: Browser game meant to advertise Resident Evil CODE:Veronica showcasing the game's weaponry.

title: Wesker's Report
availability: DVD, Resident Evil Archives II, Resident Evil Zero Official Strategy Guide (BradyGames)
description: In-universe report narrated by Albert Wesker detailing the events of Resident Evil, Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3: Nemesis. Was packaged with certain versions of Resident Evil CODE:Veronica.

title: BIOHAZARD CODE:Veronica ORIGINAL STORY
description: A short novelization of Resident Evil CODE:Veronica by Benny Matsuyama within the  BIOHAZARD CODE:Veronica Kanzenban Kaitai Shinsho guide.

title: BIO HAZARD ZOMBIE SHOOTER
description: Reaction based shooter with no story elements.

title: Resident Evil Zombie Buster
description: Wave based shooter with no story elements.

title: Resident Evil Survivor 2 CODE:Veronica
description: The second game in the Gun Survivor subseries. Serves as an epilogue to Resident Evil CODE:Veronica.

title: Resident Evil: Code Veronica (novel)
description: Novelization of Resident Evil CODE:Veronica by S.D. Perry.

title: Resident Evil Gaiden
description: Written to coincide with CODE:Veronica featuring Leon from Resident Evil 2 and Barry from the first Resident Evil.

title: Resident Evil CODE:Veronica (manhua)
description: Manhua adaptation of Resident Evil CODE:Veronica.

title: Wesker's Report II
description: Journal detailing the history of t-Virus research at the Arklay Laboratory from Albert Wesker's point of view.

title: Resident Evil (movie)
description: Paul W.S. Anderson's live-action movie adaptation of the franchise. Follows Alice as she is dragged into a raid on an Umbrella facility along with a USS team.

title: Resident Evil (remake)
availability: GC, Wii, Switch, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, PC
description: Remake of the first Resident Evil.

title: BIOHAZARD to the Liberty
description: An original novel by Suiren Kimura. It features an Umbrella owned ship called The Liberty.

title: BIOHAZARD Rose Blank
description: An original novel by Tadashi Aizawa. Follows the story of Emily Ran who is trying to create a cure for the t-Virus.

title: Samurai Edge History
description: Literaure by Tokyo Marui about the history of the Samurai Edge handguns.

title: Black Winged Resident
availability: Only printed in a Japanese magazine
description: A crow watches Raccoon City be taken over by zombies.

title: Resident Evil Assault the Nightmare
description: First person shooter mobile game with very light story elements.

title: BIOHAZARD (novel)
description: Novelization of the 2002 Paul W.S. Anderson movie "Resident Evil" by Osamu Makino.

title: biohazard (novella)
description: A short novelization of the first Resident Evil by Benny Matsuyama, released as part of the biohazard Kaitaishinsho guide.

title: Emergency Report
description: In-universe report set after the Resident Evil remake. Included as part of the biohazard Kaitaishinsho guide.

title: Resident Evil 0
availability: GC, Wii, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, Switch, PC
description: Prequel to the first Resident Evil set a day earlier featuring Rebbeca Chambers and Billy Coen. The gameplay involved controlling both character at once.

title: TOP SECRET Police Document
availability: Resident Evil Zero Official Strategy Guide (BradyGames)
description: In-universe police document in Resident Evil Zero Official Strategy Guide by BradyGames.

title: biohazard 0 (manhua)
description: Manhua adaptiation of Resident Evil 0.

title: Diary of a Madman
description: An article in Cube Magazine presented in a diary-like format depicting the story of an unreleased version of Resident Evil 4.

title: biohazard 0 (novella)
description: A short novelization of Resident Evil 0 by Benny Matsuyama, released as part of the biohazard 0 KAITAISHINSHO guide

title: Resident Evil: Dead Aim
event: Spencer Rain outbreak, Atlantic Facility outbreak
description: The fourth game in the Gun Survivor subseries. Stars Bruce McGivern and Fong Ling on an Umbrella ship called Spencer Rain, hijacked by the ex-Umbrella researcher Morpheus D. Duvall.

title: Nicholai's Letter
availability: Resident Evil Code: Veronica Official Strategy Guide (BradyGames)
description: In-universe letter written by Nicholai Ginovaef in Resident Evil CODE:Veronica X Official Strategy Guide by BradyGames.

title: Resident Evil: The Missions
description: The first in the line of mission based mobile games in the series, followed by Stories, Episodes and Operations.

title: Resident Evil Outbreak
description: Four player online co-op game featuring a of cast of civilians during the Raccoon City Incident.

title: Resident Evil Outbreak series
description: Chapters detailing the main cast's escape from the overrun J's Bar, leading them to the burning Apple Inn and Raccoon Zoo filled with infected animals.

title: Resident Evil Outbreak series
description: Chapter detailing the last moments of Raccoon City Police Department.

title: Resident Evil Outbreak series
scenario: Decisions, decisions, End of the road
description: The final chapters of Outbreak and Outbreak File#2, showing the moments before the Raccoon City Sterilization Operation.

title: BIOHAZARD THE STORIES
description: Mission based mobile game with no story elements. Sequel to Resident Evil: The Missions.

title: Resident Evil: Confidential Report
description: Turn-based action game featuring a duo of original characters, Tyler Hamilton and Naomi McClain on a run after the elusive MS-virus.

title: Resident Evil: Genesis (novel)
description: Novelization of the 2002 Paul W.S. Anderson movie "Resident Evil" by Keith R.A. DeCandido.

title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse (novel)
description: Novelization of Resident Evil: Apocalypse by Keith R.A. DeCandido.

title: Resident Evil Outbreak File #2
description: Sequel to Resident Evil Outbreak.

title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
description: Sequel to Paul W.S. Anderson's Resident Evil. Heavily adapts elements from Resident Evil 3: Nemesis.

title: The Raccoon City Times
event: Prelude to the Raccoon City Incident
description: Promotional newspaper released for Resident Evil: Apocalypse.

title: Resident Evil: Zero Hour
description: Novelization of Resident Evil 0 by S.D. Perry.

title: Resident Evil 4
availability: GC, Wii, Switch, PS2, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, iOS, Zeebo, Oculus Quest 2, PC
description: First installment set after the fall of Umbrella. Features Leon Kennedy dealing with a bioterrorist in Spain using parasite BOWs.

title: Chainsaw Maniac
description: Promotional browser game for the PS2 version of Resident Evil 4.

title: biohazard 4 (novella)
description: A short novelization of Resident Evil 4 by Benny Matsuyama, released as part of the biohazard 4 Kaitai Shinsho guide

description: An article in the Japanese gun enthusiast magazine ARMS detailing how Leon got his signature handgun "Silver Ghost"

title: Report about Ada
event: Prelude to the Abduction of the President's Daughter
description: In-universe report setting up the events of Resident Evil 4. Included as part of Biohazard 4 kaitaishinsho revised edition.

description: Book released alongside Biohazard 4 Incubate featuring full size images also seen during the credits of Resident Evil 4.

title: Biohazard 4 Incubate
description: CGI movie adaptation of Resident Evil 4 using footage from the game.

title: BIOHAZARD the episodes
description: Mission based mobile game with no story elements. Sequel to BIOHAZARD THE STORIES.

title: BIOHAZARD THE OPERATIONS
description: Mission based mobile game with no story elements. Sequel to BIOHAZARD the episodes.

title: Resident Evil: Extinction (novel)
description: Novelization of Resident Evil: Extinction by Keith R.A. DeCandido.

title: Resident Evil: Extinction
description: Sequel to Resident Evil: Apocalypse. Features Alice roaming an apocalyptic wasteland after a global t-Virus outbreak while Claire Redfield runs a convoy of survivors.

description: Flash game developed by Sony to advertise Resident Evil: Extinction.

description: Manga prequel to the then upcoming Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: On-rails shooter retelling of Resident Evil 0, Resident Evil and Resident Evil 3: Nemesis with additional perspectives and an original scenario featuring Chris Redfield, Jill Valentine, and Albert Wesker bringing Umbrella to an end.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Albert Wesker's actions during the Ecliptic Express Incident.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Rebecca's arrival at the Spencer Mansion.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Albert Wesker's actions close to the end of the Mansion Incident.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Ada Wong's escape from Raccoon City.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Original chapter featuring Chris Redfield and Jill Valentine bringing Umbrella to an end.

title: Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles
description: Albert Wesker's actions during Umbrella's End.

title: Wesker's Extra Report
description: A booklet that came with the special editions of Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles in Japan. Is about Wesker discovering the last stronghold of Umbrella just before the original scenario of the game.

title: Biohazard The Umbrella Chronicles SIDE A
event: Ecliptic Express Incident, Mansion Incident, Raccoon City Incident
description: Novelization of the first half of Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles by Osamu Makino.

title: Biohazard The Umbrella Chronicles SIDE B
description: Novelization of the second half of Resident Evil: The Umbrella Chronicles by Osamu Makino.

title: Resident Evil 4: Mobile Edition
description: Simplified edition of Resident Evil 4 for mobile devices. An updated version called Resident Evil 4: PLATINUM was later released for iOS.

title: Resident Evil: Genesis
description: Mobile adaptation of the Resident Evil remake.

title: PACHI-SLOT biohazard
description: Pachislot game based on the Resident Evil remake, though with some heavy alterations, mainly Chris, Jill, Barry and Rebecca working together and Wesker only observing.

title: Angela's Diary
description: Document bundled with the collector's edition of the Japanese release of Resident Evil: Degeneration.

title: Resident Evil Degeneration
event: Harvardville Airport incident, Air Dome Laboratory Incident
description: The first feature length CGI movie in the series featuring Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield.

title: Fear You Can't Forget
description: Promotional live-action video series for Resident Evil 5. Features Chris dealing with PTSD from the events of the game.

title: Experience Kijuju
description: A series of blog entries set before Resident Evil 5 about a citizen living in Kijuju.

title: Resident Evil: Degeneration
description: Mobile game adaptation of Resident Evil: Degeneration.

title: BSAA Remote Desktop
description: Supplemental website for Resident Evil 5 that served to tell the story leading directly up to game. About the BSAA observing events and communications in Kijuju and slowly suspecting BOWs are involved and being traded in the area.

title: BSAA Observation Diary
description: Famitsu blog coverin the events of Resident Evil 5 as if they're actually happening in real time.

title: Resident Evil 5
availability: PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, Switch, Shield Android TV, PC
description: First major game of the 7th generation of home consoles. Featured Chris Redfield now with the BSAA investing a BOW dealing in Africa, leading to a reunion with Jill Valentine and defeat of Albert Wesker. Notable for the campaign supporting full online co-op.

title: Resident Evil 5
availability: PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, Switch, Shield Android TV, PC
description: Chris Redfield and Sheva Alomar's endeavors in Africa.

title: BIOHAZARD 5 (novella)
description: A short novelization of Resident Evil 5 by Benny Matsuyama in the guidebook Biohazard 5 Kaitai Shinsho.

title: Resident Evil: Uprising
description: Mobile adaptation of Resident Evil 2.

title: Resident Evil: The Darkside Chronicles
description: On-rails shooter retelling of Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil CODE:Veronica with an original chapter taking place in South America featuring Leon Kennedy and Jack Krauser before the events of Resident Evil 4.

title: Darkside Report
description: A booklet released together with Biohazard: The Darkside Chronicles Collector's Package and Biohazard Chronicles HD Selection.

title: BIOHAZARD Survival Door
description: Reaction based shooter with no story elements.

title: Resident Evil 5
availability: PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, Switch, Shield Android TV, PC

availability: PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, Switch, Shield Android TV, PC

title: Resident Evil: The Deck Building Game
description: Card game. Artwork recycled from the series' history.

title: Resident Evil: Mercenaries VS.
description: A mobile adaptation of Resident Evil 5's The Mercenaries minigame.

title: The War on Horror
description: Promotional Facebook game for Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D. Essentially is a simple point-and-click shooting gallery.

title: Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D - War on Horror
description: Live-action trailer for Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D.

title: Resident Evil: The Mercenaries 3D
description: A full game iteration of the Mercenaries minigames from Resident Evil 4 and Resident Evil 5. Has no plot-elements.

description: Social mobile game for the GREE platform. Presents no story elements.

description: Prequel ARG to Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City hosted by Ian Sider.

title: Resident Evil: Revelations - Extended Trailer
description: CGI trailer serving as a prologue for Resident Evil: Revelations.

title: Queen Zenobia Cruise Lines
description: Viral marketing campaign for Resident Evil: Revelations.

title: The first mission!
description: A short promotional manga for Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City explaining what kind of game it is.

title: Triple Impact
description: CGI trailer with original content for Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City.

title: No Hope Left
description: Viral marketing campaign for Resident Evil 6 involving recorded sightings of BOWs throughout the world.

title: Resident Evil: Revelations
availability: 3DS, Wii U, Switch, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, PC
description: FBC's final moments near the end of Terragrigia Panic.

title: Resident Evil: Revelations
availability: 3DS, Wii U, Switch, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, PC

title: Resident Evil: Revelations
availability: 3DS, Wii U, Switch, PS3, PS4, X360, XOne, PC

title: Jessica's Report
description: Bonus DVD bundled with the original 3DS release of Resident Evil: Revelations in Japan. Features the character Jessica Sherawat reporting the events of the game to Excella Gionne, tying into Resident Evil 5.

title: Resident Evil: Operation Raccoon City
description: A "what-if" scenario incorporating events from both Resident Evil 2 and Resident Evil 3: Nemesis with two campaigns featuring USS Delta Team "Wolfpack" and American Army's Spec-Ops unit "Echo Six"

description: Manga focusing on BSAA investigating a series of biohazard incidents occurring at Marhawa School in Singapore. Features Chris Redfield as a supporting character. Serves as a tie-in to the then upcoming Resident Evil 6.

title: Resident Evil: The Marhawa Desire
description: A series of biohazard incidents occurring at Marhawa School in Singapore. Features Chris Redfield as a supporting character.

title: Street Invasion

description: A 4koma webcomic parodying events from around the series.

description: Multiplayer mode depicting the skirmishes between factions using Umbrella Corps mercenaries to gather virus samples in quarantine zones.

title: Resident Evil: The Final Chapter
event: Project Alice, Return to Raccoon City
description: Sequel to Resident Evil: Retribution. Skips the cliffhanger ending of the previous film and starts some time after with Alice going back to the ruins of Raccoon City.

title: BAKAHAZA
description: Crossover between Resident Evil and Tensai Bakabon. The game is a humorous retelling of the first Resident Evil with the Tensai Bakabon characters.

title: Bio Illustrated Essay
description: Series of comedic online comics drawn by Yuusuke Hori.

title: Get this out there!
description: Viral marketing stunt for Resident Evil 7: biohazard involving sending out actual VHS tapes to media outlets. Features Peter Walken before he was captured.

title: Resident Evil 7: biohazard
availability: PS4, PS5, XOne, Series X/S, Switch, Stadia, Luna, PC
description: Major title that serves as soft branding reboot. Features the new character Ethan Winters looking for his wife in a Louisiana, only to be abducted and tortured by the Baker Family. Is notably disconnected from the series' previously established plot points and introduces new mold based BOWs. Also the first game released on Capcom's new proprietary game engine, the RE Engine.

title: Resident Evil 7: biohazard
availability: PS4, PS5, XOne, Series X/S, Switch, Stadia, Luna, PC
description: Ethan Winters' ordeal in the Baker mansion.

title: Resident Evil 7: biohazard
availability: PS4, PS5, XOne, Series X/S, Switch, Stadia, Luna, PC
description: Covers how the ship transporting Mia Winters and the mold based BOW Eveline would arrive near the Bakers' property.

title: Resident Evil 7: biohazard
scenario: Derelict house footage, Nightmare, Bedroom, 21, Happy Birthday

title: Resident Evil 7: biohazard
availability: PS4, PS5, XOne, Series X/S, Switch, Stadia, Luna, PC
